name: magnet-rise
caption: Magnet Rise

effect.short: User is immune to Ground moves and effects for five turns.
effect.full:
For five turns, the user is immune to []{type:ground} moves.

If the user is under the effect of []{move:ingrain} or has []{ability:levitate}, this move will [fail]{mechanic:fail}.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during []{move:gravity}.

This effect is passed on by []{move:baton-pass}.

flavorText:
The user levitates using electrically generated
magnetism for five turns.
